name: Administrative Center
context: These official tablets were recovered from the ruins of what appears to be the settlement's administrative headquarters. The building featured multiple offices, record storage rooms, and a central archive. The tablets show formal governmental procedures, legal documents, and bureaucratic correspondence with neighboring settlements.
